invocations.description: Mounts your character on the creature that is set as your mount in the client.
invocations.ex:
auto(1000,2500)
if not ($pzone or $mounted) then
	mount()
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 1000~2500 milliseconds, it will check you are not inside a protection zone and not mounted. If so, it will mount on the last mounted animal.
